articles.author: Hannah Demissie
articles.title: Most Americans approve of Supreme Court decision restricting use of race in college admissions: POLL - ABC News
articles.description: Most Americans support the Supreme Court's decision on affirmative action.
articles.content: A majority of Americans approve of the Supreme Court ruling restricting the use of race as a factor in college admissions, though the country is more divided on other high-profile rulings and increas… [+5199 chars]
